DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether regular dosage paracetamol cause transaminitis ( hepatitis ) evaluate potency treatment dengue infection .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Paracetamol Antipyretic Treatment Dengue Infection Adults
DOC.criteria: Patient age > 18 year Dengue infection diagnose NS1 antigen , Dengue immunoglobulin M antibody , polymerase chain reaction Admitted hospital Written inform consent patient attend relative able willing give inform consent Other possible cause fever dengue infection Pregnancy Unable take medication Aminotransferase level 5 time upper normal limit Allergy paracetamol tramadol Paracetamol indicate condition dengue infection Critically ill patient need ICU invasive ventilation support History cirrhosis Unable comunicate
